alert.note: Alert for Banner; Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 2:17PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Scotts Bluff, western Morrill and northeastern Banner Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 116 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms near Chimney Rock State Park, or 17 miles southeast of Scottsbluff, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Bayard, Minatare, Northport, Chimney Rock State Park, Bridgeport State Recreation Area, Angora, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92, Court House And Jail Rocks, Moomaws Corner, Redington, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62, South Bayard Junction, Broadwater, Melbeta and McGrew. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
